ModMetaData.name: Call of Cthulhu - Cults A16
ModMetaData.author: Jecrell
ModMetaData.description:
V1.3.3 Gameplay expansion for RimWorld.
You can now: *found a cult *worship monstrous deities *make offerings and animal sacrifices *make human sacrifices in return for powerful spells (20 intotal, plus a dozen side effects).
